I’ll be honest with  you. I’m having a bad few days. Some pretty awful family news, and some lingering problems with the server upgrade are making my life less than fun. But… …then one of our web developers remixes Stuart’s [Movable Type intro video](http://www.onemanandhisblog.com/archives/2008/05/screencasting_movable_type_4.html) from a few days ago. And it makes me laugh:
